subject: IonFlow 2000 - ions not working
body:
Hi,

My IonFlow 2000 (serial IF2K-2025-34521) that I bought in early December 2025 is not producing ions anymore. The ion indicator light stays off even when the ionic function is turned on.

I've been cleaning the filter every week and haven't used any heavy hair products near it.

I bought it on December 3, 2025 from Best Buy. I can provide the receipt if needed.

David Park
321 Pine Avenue
Seattle, WA 98101
david.park@yahoo.com
206-555-0183

metadata.reason: Ionic generator defect is covered, maintenance followed
